Posts.Content: isabelbidi1 wrote: Hello, I hope you can help me because I'm quite worried. About two days ago my nipple started bleeding. I was running at the time and I could sense my nipple burning, but it was only when I got back that I realised that it had bled. It was only a few drops so I thought it would be because of the friction with my bra. But today when I woke up I had scab all around my nipple and it was fairly cracked. I wasn't very worried but I decided to check the internet just in case. Every page I've looked at makes it seem as if I had breast cancer. Could this be possible? I'm only 19 and in every other sense I feel perfectly fine Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: could it be breast cancer? isabelbidi1 isabelbidi1

Posts.Content: Dec 27, 2012 04:18PM isabelbidi1 wrote: PS: I'm happy to have found this sight with such amazing and inspiring strories of strong women all around the world. I'll come back to it every time I feel like I have nothing to give thanks for.
Posts.Title: could it be breast cancer? isabelbidi1 isabelbidi1

Posts.Content: Dec 27, 2012 04:14PM isabelbidi1 wrote: thank you very much you've calmed me in some way :) . I'm on holidays in the middle of nowhere wright now and I didn’t want to get my family worried asking anybody to take me to a hospital but I suppose I was being silly, I'll go to the hospital first thing tomorrow to be able to continue enjoying a care free Christmas Thank you
